title: New: Jack Garratt – I Couldn’t Want You Anyway
content:
I’m a sucker for this style of music.

Granted, it’s all the rage right now, I believe it’s viewed as ‘alternative R&B’, and, if done well, can be as emotionally hard-hitting as anything around. London’s Jack Garratt nails it on his debut track, I Couldn’t Want You Anyway, a gorgeous vocal led composition, reciting an oft-repeated story of lost love and ill-gifted chances. Check it out below, not recommended if you’re already in a weepy mood.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
